items.sentence: If you cannot afford an attorney, one will be provided for you.
To have doubts about oneself is the first sign of intelligence.
You shouldn't read people's private letters without permission.
Tom asked Mary why she didn't want to go to the dance with him.
I wanted Tom to do that, but he told me that he wouldn't do it.
I think that people should stop using disposable shopping bags.
It's about time that somebody did something about that problem.
I like to go to a local jazz club where I can enjoy live music.
I make it a rule to take a walk for half an hour every morning.
If you need a dictionary, I'll lend you an old one that I have.
